Sub: Access of vehicle upto the tarmac area of civil airports in the country.

In continuation to this Bureau circular No. 15/2003 dated 22 6.2003, on the subject
cited above, Shri S. Jaipal Reddy, Hon'ble Minister for Information and Broadcasting and
Culture, may be permitted to avail the facility of AAI ferry vehicle to and from aircraft,

during his departure/ arrival by air at all civil airports.in the country on medical grounds, for
period of sx months. » “.
